lead_paragraph: Twenty years after the events depicted in "Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon," four heroes of the Martial World - Silent Wolf, Yu Shu-lien, Tie- Fang, and Snow Vase - must join forces to keep the mystical sword known as Green Destiny out of the hands of the wicked Hades Dai.
